<nav>
    <button class="btn active" (click)="navigateTo('/home')">ABOUT</button>
    <button class="btn" (click)="navigateTo('/education')">EDUCATION</button>
    <button class="btn" (click)="navigateTo('/skills')">SKILLS</button>
    <button class="btn" (click)="navigateTo('/experiences')">EXPERIENCES</button>
    <button class="btn" (click)="navigateTo('/projects')">PROJECTS</button>
    <button class="btn" (click)="navigateTo('/certifications')">CERTIFICATIONS</button>
    <button class="btn" (click)="navigateTo('/contact')">CONTACT</button>
</nav>
